dressing_class.description: The general class name of the dressing. Example 'raw'

structure_parameters.description: general parameters at instantiation. Content depends on class

dressing_parameters.description: general parameters at instantiation. Content depends on class

dressing_private.description: private parameters at instantiation. Content depends on class
